short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension for encrypting emails on gmail webmail.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gmail Encrypter allows users to safely secure email text client side with a preset key, that can be accessed by other people with the same extension. This can protect from email admins or other providers from viewing sensitive email content.
